DOC.brief_summary: Investigators aim to evaluate the accuracy in the measurement of the esophageal and gastric pressure of a new enteral feeding tube
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of a New Enteral Feeding Tube for the Measurement of Esophageal and Gastric Pressure
DOC.criteria: Requiring the placement of an enteral feeding tube esophageal ulcers severe coagulophaty thrombocytopenia
